sources.name: rawDataParquet
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~>  rawDataParquet

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared rawDataParquet = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://ssattirajudemorgstg.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/parquet/PS_20174392719_1491204439457_log.parquet"),
  Parquet = Parquet.Document(AdfDoc)
in
  Parquet;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = rawDataParquet,
  #"Promoted headers" = Table.PromoteHeaders(Source, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Promoted headers", each [type] = "DEBIT"),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Filtered rows", {{"newbalanceOrig", type number}}),
  #"Filtered rows 1" = Table.SelectRows(#"Changed column type", each [newbalanceOrig] < 100)
in
  #"Filtered rows 1";
